meta.title: Vo Thai Bao | Full-stack Developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing full-stack development work and skills

about.bio: Dynamic and resourceful Full-stack Developer with over 4 years of experience in developing cutting-edge web applications. Proficient in ensuring that user experience remains at the forefront of design choices while balancing functional and aesthetic aspects. Skilled in both front-end and back-end development, dedicated to maintaining brand consistency throughout the development process.
focus: Developing scalable web applications with modern technologies
Leading development teams and mentoring junior developers
Optimizing application performance and user experience

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Currently developing and optimizing Hyper Game Server backend supporting 15M+ Android & iOS users, ensuring high availability and performance. Leading backend development initiatives and coordinating with cross-functional teams.
achievements: Developed and optimized Hyper Game Server backend supporting 15M+ users
Engineered scalable slot game logic with reward calculation and RNG systems
Designed multiple CMS platforms for game data management and analytics
Integrated Google & Apple IAP systems, along with Google Ads SDK for monetization
Led backend team coordination, code reviews, and deployment planning

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Led architecture and development of key projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives and user needs. Collaborated with cross-functional teams and implemented best practices for testing and deployment.
achievements: Led architecture and development of key business-critical projects
Implemented comprehensive testing and deployment best practices
Drove development of user-centric applications based on feedback and usability studies
Mentored junior developers and fostered skill development within the team
Championed quality assurance culture and proactive bug identification

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Designed, developed, tested and deployed features for educational platform. Focused on user experience optimization and maintaining brand consistency throughout the development process.
achievements: Designed and deployed educational platform features promptly
Ensured user experience determined all design choices
Achieved optimal balance between functional and aesthetic designs
Maintained brand consistency throughout the development process
Solved complex challenges using modern web development methodologies

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Designed and developed scalable features with focus on optimizing user experience and performance. Worked in agile environment contributing to sprint planning and fostering collaboration with stakeholders.
achievements: Designed and developed scalable features focusing on UX optimization
Worked effectively in agile environment with sprint planning and retrospectives
Fostered collaboration with product managers and stakeholders
Prioritized features and resolved issues effectively
Contributed to continuous improvement of team efficiency

education.institution: Da Nang University of Science and Technology
